title: Sygic 13.2.2 - Android - 12 Arab Countries - Cracked

You will find 12 rar files for 12 countries!

You will get 2 files inside the rar (Sygic folder and sygic 13.2.2.apk)

file manager.
Install the apk and hit DONE!! DON'T OPEN SYGIC YET!!
Go back to your computer and copy the folder Sygic and past it in your device.
Done!!

All countries have english and Arabic language for settings and also English and
Arabic voice navigation (male-female).
